name: Out of the Woods (River Banks, Coeur)
name_original: Out of the Woods (River Banks, Coeur)
description:
After spending too much time indoors, Paige is thrown out of the house by her parents and told to play outside. While exploring her backyard, she sees a mysterious light, and it leads her deeper and deeper into the woods until she is completely lost.

It's not until she meets a magical being that she's able to find her way back through the whimsical woods. Through puzzle solving and playful jokes, the pair become close friends.

Out of the Woods was made in 30 days for the $1000 JTAGame Jam.

JTA Tutorials used for the jam:
- How to make a Radio
- How to make a Character Swap System like the Lego Games

Created by:

River Banks and Coeur
